name: bissara fava beans
ingredients: 450 g of dried fava beans (or split peas)
steps: Soak the fava beans overnight in water. Drain.
Peel and chop the carrots and onion.
Sauté the onion, fava beans, carrots, and 1 tsp of ground cumin in a pot with olive oil.
Add the vegetable broth and 1L of water. Cover and let simmer for 25 minutes.
Serve hot, often with a drizzle of olive oil, cumin, and paprika.
